title: One Summer In France
description: Bev and Carol canâ€™t believe it when the university offers grants to pay for a three month stay in France as part of their degree course. They set off to the Med and encounter people and places that give them an education they could never get in a lecture theatre. Join them on their hilarious adventure and get to know their very different attitudes to life.The book is based on the author's real-life experiences and is a prequel to her humorous memoir 'Bunny on a Bike'.
author: Bev Spicer
